name: After the Fall: Frontrunner Season
storyline: The journey has begun, Harvest Runners are finding their way to the Line and begin the push towards a safer Los Angeles. With more hands on deck, new areas are explored, but new threats will rise as well.
summary: From new maps, weapons and system updates, we have an update from the development team on what's coming up next for After the Fall!

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: After the Fall | Frontrunner Season Update [ESRB]
